### Government Tender Announcement

**Notice ID:** F1022-240002
**Tender Title:** Request for Proposal: Water Purification System

**Reference Number:** WS4327010022-Doc4352645729

**Tender Closing Date:** January 22, 2024, at 14:00 (Local Time)

**Key Tender Details:**

* **Pre-Qualified Suppliers:** Only suppliers holding a valid Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI have been invited to submit a bid.
* **Commodity:** Water Purification Equipment (Classification: 47101514)
* **Procurement Category:** Good and Services (Classification: GD)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** British Columbia
* **Contractor Address:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

**Contact Information:**

* **Ji-Yon Isabell Park (SPAC/PSPC)**
* **Email:** ji-yonisabell.park@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** Not available
* **Fax:** Not available

**Accessing the Tender Materials:**

Please follow the tender notice on SAP Ariba at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18271919.

**Requirements and Evaluation Criteria:**

Only suppliers who meet the pre-qualifications will be assessed on the basis of the lowest price.

Note:

* If you are interested in this procurement, kindly review the full tender materials carefully to ensure that all necessary requirements are met.
* Failure to meet the necessary requirements may result in disqualification.
